summary: Uno is a popular card game created in Ohio, USA, in 1971. The name comes from the Spanish and Italian word for 'one'. It's played with a unique deck of cards and is similar to other games like Crazy Eights and Mau-Mau. The goal is to be the first player to get rid of all your cards. Uno is now owned by the toy company Mattel, which bought the rights in 1992. It's a fun and easy game for all ages to enjoy!
title: Uno (card game)
